column4: I'm trying to install a package on maverick, I'm getting this:  ros-electric-eigen : Depends: libeigen3-dev (= 3.0.1-1+ros4~maverick) but 3.0.1-1+ros4~natty is to be installed. It looks like it doesn't want to install the package pending the upgrade. But I don't want to do the upgrade, any ideas?
I have found aptitude is pretty good at recommending methods to get your package working
I'm sorry, I'm not sure what you mean.
such as aptitude install package and if there are conflicts it gives you alternatives to get it working
